attributes.action: Review the security of Scholemoor Cemetery Bradford, following ongoing vandalism to babys graves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to ongoing vandalism and theft from babies graves at Scholemoor Rd Cemetery Bradford.We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to request a review of the security arrangements for this cemetery to ensure that our children may rest in peace and relieve the grief of parents who are deeply distressed by the present situation.

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority with your concerns.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
